text:
From April to December 2020, self reported likelihood of getting a #COVID19 #vaccine dropped ~20% from 74% to 56%.
Amongst African Americans, only 38% reported likelihood of getting vaccinated v 59% whites. 
Lots of communication/ reassurance needed!
https://t.co/zmPBnVbr6a https://t.co/FMglnOlvxO
